game.name: Neon Fantasy: Owls
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Neon Fantasy: Owls is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Neon Fantasy: Owls is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.
